channel.title: PI timer for multiple emotes help please?

item.title: PI timer for multiple emotes help please?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The int, testtimer, is never modified. Since it is never modified, the cycle event doesn’t do another emote.

Read full topic
item.source: PI timer for multiple emotes help please?

item.title: PI timer for multiple emotes help please?
item.dc:creator: @corpze corpze
item.description:
@corpze wrote:

hi guys, i have this code,but it dosent contenue:/ it only takes the first one never contenue’s. can some one help me?

[code]public void testemote(final Client c) {
CycleEventHandler.getSingleton().addEvent(this, new CycleEvent() {
int testtimer = 5;
@Override
public void execute(CycleEventContainer container) {

		if(testtimer > 0) {
		testtimer--;
		}	
							   if (testtimer == 5) {
									 c.pNpcId = 1;
									 c.startAnimation(407);
                                                                             c.updateRequired = true;
                                                                             c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

                                }
                               if (testtimer == 3) {
									c.pNpc = true;
									c.pNpcId = 2;
									c.startAnimation(405);
									c.updateRequired = true;
                                                                            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                                }
								if (testtimer == 0) {
                                                                            c.pNpc = false;
									c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
									}
									if (c == null || testtimer <= 0) {
                                                                            this.stop();
                                                                     return;
                                }													
            container.stop();
        }
        @Override
        public void stop() {
        }
    }, 2);
	}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: PI timer for multiple emotes help please?
